alert.note: Alert for Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN LOGAN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Bellefontaine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Marysville, Bellefontaine, Richwood, West Liberty, West Mansfield, Rushsylvania, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, Raymond, New Jerusalem, Pickrelltown, Byhalia, Broadway, Middleburg, Mcmorran, Pharisburg, Pottersburg, Somersville, Essex and East Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
